explains: adj. 舒服的；轻松的（等于 comfortable）

sentences.en: Get out of your comfy seat, and have a damn good look at what you're up against.
sentences.cn: 离开你舒服的座椅，好好端详一下你面对的是什么。

sentences.en: Match the top with a camisole and comfy pants.
sentences.cn: 上衣搭配背心和舒适的裤子。

sentences.en: Choose a comfy chair, preferably one with armrests.
sentences.cn: 选择一把舒服的椅子，最好有扶手。
